description:
In an attempt to overthrow Demon King Azul, Lone Swordsman Dante boards a ghost ship where Azul is thought to be.  Alas, what was waiting for him wasn’t Azul himself but a Kraken being controlled by Azul!  Dante fell right into the trap!  Fire and the gang are lead by Pandora to defeat the Kraken and help save Dante!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パイレーツ・オブ・クラーケン
